entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character in the story, who is walking alongside Hagrid.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: A gamekeeper at Hogwarts, who is with Harry and seems to be in pain.

entities.name: the astronomy tower
entities.description: A location where a crowd has gathered, and something terrible has happened.

entities.name: mark
entities.description: Someone who may have been thrown from the Astronomy Tower, mentioned by Hagrid.

relationships.description: Harry is walking alongside Hagrid through the crowd.
Hagrid seems to be associated with the Astronomy Tower, and is in pain when thinking about it.
